column2: Position :  Junior Engineer - Civil #Experience :  1 - 3 Years #Qualification :  Diploma  /  B.E. / B.Tech in Civil #Location :  All Over India #Notice Period :  Immediate/ Serving/ 30 days Please Note : Candidates should have experience in Industrial projects(Should be working on contractors' side)   Key Responsibilities 1.   Planning & Execution - Study the major aspects of the assigned part of the project to understand scope of work.- Study of BOQ and technical specifications.- Study GFC drawings and prepare detailed planning for the assigned works in line with the base line schedule for a daily, weekly and monthly basis.- To work out the resources with respect to the planning.- Finalize work sequence and organize work in line with targets and ensure productivity.- Ensure availability and understanding of (WMS) work method statement with the execution team and get mock up approved from the client / PMC wherever required.- Guide the team assigned to the work on technicalities involved in the work, workmanship and Quality requirements and how to achieve the same without creating a re-work situation.- Have an overall view of the safety requirements of the site/area assigned and support safety to achieve safe work place at all stages of work. - Identify any unique or challenging part of the structures to be focused on.- Deploy the optimum team/workforce for desired productivity.- Have the team aligned to focus of wastage reduction and housekeeping.- Create the awareness in the team and make sure that the Plant & Machinery does not remain idle at work place.- Create a discipline in the team for daily progress reporting & planning for next days work in advance.- Discuss liquidation plan with team and PM under special circumstances to tide over the setbacks.- Ensuring timely preparation, certification and submission of relevant JMRs to the billing engineer.- Identify surplus material and shift or return the same to optimize rentals.- Monitor & optimize repetitions of shuttering material. Control wastage and damages.- Create, delegate and monitor uninterrupted work front to respective contractors with necessary resources to meet the targets.- Ensure daily TBT is done.- Timely preparation submission and approval of BBS for assigned structures. Ensuring the execution is in line to the approved BBS.- Ensure recording of site instructions if any and timely submission to the QS engineer.- Control wastage to contain it within the permissible limits. Encourage use of cut pieces and scrap wherever possible. Explore gainful use of surplus / waste concrete.- Support the QS engineer in formulating the Rate Analysis for any Non Tender item required to be executed as per approved drawings. Ensure the rate is approved prior to execution of the work and amendment issued.- Keep up to date record of all the reasons attributable to client for delay in his work area and ensure that the same is available when required for Extension of Time & realizing overrun charges.- Preparation and submission of daily progress data to planning engineer. 2.   Sub-Contractor Management : - Raising requisitions in advance and follow up with PM for brought out items and third party works.- Monitor labour supply contractors for adequate manpower supply in line with the project targets.- Monitor third party works for timely supply and release of fronts in line with project schedule.- Ensure timely submission of bills for respective labor contractors and third parity works and follow-up for its payments.- Ensuring daily weekly productivity of respective contractors. 3.   Special jobs and innovative approach: - Have focus on special jobs requiring specialized agencies and equipment. Align and execute on the common understanding for these works. - Adopt new methodologies for improving productivity and cost optimization wherever possible.- Ensure proper protocols and clearances before execution of any works from concerned stakeholders.- Preparation, submission and documentation of handing over protocols for all completed structures.- Expeditious liquidation of snag list for final demobilization from the assigned area. 4.   Team Building: - Keep the team motivated and inculcate spirit of team work.- Use work in hand to impart technical and practical knowledge to improve productivity and quality.- Have regular interactions with the team members and identify area for training to improve their performance.- Ensure interdepartmental coordination for the timely and smooth functioning. #Contact Person : Ms. Tejashrri Kallal HR - Head Office Contact/ Whatsapp : 8308841939 Mail Id : hr.pn@rohanbuilders.com

column2: ITI Civil Draftsman from a recognized Institute      Experience between 3 - 5 years in Civil Drafting      Technical Drawing Creation: Develop detailed technical drawings, blueprints, and schematics based on specifications, sketches, and requirements provided by engineers or clients.     Die Design: Design dies, molds, and tooling components used in metal stamping, casting, forging, or injection molding processes, ensuring precision, accuracy, and manufacturability.     CAD Software Utilization: Use computer-aided design (CAD) software such as AutoCAD, SolidWorks, CATIA, or NX to create and modify technical drawings and 3D models of dies, tooling, and components.     Material Selection: Select appropriate materials, alloys, and coatings based on mechanical properties, durability, and application requirements for die and tooling components.     Tolerance Analysis: Perform tolerance analysis and geometric dimensioning and tolerancing (GD&T) to ensure parts and components meet design specifications and functional requirements.     Collaboration: Collaborate with engineers, designers, machinists, and production personnel to review designs, address design issues, and optimize manufacturing processes.     Documentation: Prepare and maintain documentation, including bill of materials (BOM), design revisions, engineering change orders (ECOs), and technical specifications related to die and tooling design.     Quality Assurance: Conduct quality checks and inspections of prototypes, samples, and production parts to verify conformance to design specifications and quality standards.     Problem-Solving: Identify design problems, root causes of defects, and opportunities for design improvements, and propose solutions to enhance product quality and manufacturing efficiency.     Compliance and Safety: Ensure designs comply with industry standards, regulations, and safety guidelines governing tool and die making processes, materials handling, and equipment operation.

column2: Job Summary:  We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Engineer specializing in high-rise building construction to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for overseeing and managing all aspects of construction activities related to high-rise buildings, ensuring adherence to project specifications, quality standards, safety protocols, and timelines. Responsibilities: Lead and      supervise a team of engineers, foremen, and construction workers to ensure      efficient and timely execution of high-rise building construction      projects. Coordinate with      architects, structural engineers, and other stakeholders to review and      interpret construction drawings, plans, and specifications. Plan and      schedule construction activities, allocate resources, and establish work      priorities to meet project objectives and deadlines. Conduct regular      site inspections to monitor progress, quality of workmanship, and      adherence to safety standards and regulations. Manage      subcontractors, suppliers, and vendors, including procurement of materials      and equipment, to ensure timely delivery and cost-effective project      execution. Implement and      enforce quality control measures to ensure that construction activities      meet or exceed industry standards and project specifications. Develop and      maintain project documentation, including progress reports, work      schedules, budgets, and change orders, to track project performance and      ensure transparency. Identify      potential risks, issues, and obstacles to project success, and develop      proactive strategies to mitigate them. Collaborate      with project management team to resolve technical challenges, optimize      construction processes, and drive continuous improvement initiatives. Mentor and      coach junior engineers and construction staff, providing guidance,      training, and support to foster their professional development and growth. Qualifications: Bachelors      degree in civil engineering or related field. Minimum of 8-10      years of progressive experience in high-rise building construction, with a      proven track record of successful project delivery. column1: Deputy Team Leader cum Senior Quality Control Engineer
column2: A Team Lead is a professional who is responsible for leading, guiding, and supervising a team of employees to achieve specific goals and objectives. Some of the key responsibilities of a Team Lead include:      Providing direction, guidance, and support to team members to help them achieve their individual and team goals.      Managing team schedules, delegating tasks, and ensuring that deadlines are met.      Mentoring, coaching, and providing feedback to team members to help them grow and develop their skills.      Identifying and resolving conflicts and obstacles that may impact team performance.      Ensuring that team members have the necessary resources and support to perform their job effectively.The ideal candidate for this role should have strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills

Drive project implementation within the optimum turn around time.   ??Establish Organization guidelines on project scheduling and cost control; Set cost saving targets and  build a sense of commercial awareness amongst all project execution personnel.   ??Provide input and ensure implementation of robust quality assurance & HSE policies.   ??Lead the timely empanelment of partners (consultants, vendors, contractors etc) to suit business /  project needs, through stringent evaluation in collaboration with the Contracts and procurement  departments.   ??Ensure high operational efficiency, quality and service delivery, coordinate with QA for periodic  audits and drive compliance with ISO and other quality & safety standards.   ??Lead project review meetings with the consultants and contractors for critical projects;
